name: places/ChIJ45A0Ys9YwokRmEWhF9WXX9o
formattedAddress: 645 Main St, New York, NY 10044, USA
adrFormatAddress: 645 Main St, New York, NY 10044-0010, USA

originalText.text: This was the first time coming to the facility although it was nice. The lady at the front desk didn’t get her name, however me and my brother got a day pass and was told the wrong information. The gym before 6 pm is strictly basketball which we only wanted the woman tells us at 6:30pm that soccer will take place. We agree that we would pay for the 15$ since we got there around 4:45. We told the managers Philip and Yakov that the desk has misinformed us and it’s rather we keep playing or a reimbursement for the confusion with the time. Philip was highly unprofessional as he told us no and who told us this information. We tell him the front desk and he goes “there are signs up”. We explain to him this is our first time her we didn’t know. He began to argue with us. I asked for a simple apology. He then replies I didn’t say it so why would I apologize. As a manager this was the low of the low. Instead of apologizing. We became very tilted. They called security on us as I cuss him out for being a poor manager. The security followed us in the bathroom   Harassing us. Then four more officers comes into the bathroom including a woman officer. Luckily I took a video. The last bit of it the “trespassed” us for their mistake.

Whoever built this court has never hooped in their life
